inputParameters.name: instructions
inputParameters.description: List or tree of instructions to be executed as a batch

inputParameters.name: run
inputParameters.description: If True, executes the batch of instruction on the robot.

outputParameters.name: done
outputParameters.description: Confirmation that the instructions have been executed on the robot.

outputParameters.name: results
outputParameters.description: Feedback received from the batch of instructions, or future result objects if the option to wait for completion is deactivated.
